messages.subject: HesFes (that big English campout)
messages.msgSnippet: _http://sandradodd.com/hesfes_ (http://sandradodd.com/hesfes) HesFes stands for Home Educators Seaside FEStival.  It happens in late  May every year, in
messages.messageBody:
_http://sandradodd.com/hesfes_ (http://sandradodd.com/hesfes)

HesFes stands for Home Educators Seaside FEStival. It happens in late May
every year, in England. Holly got to go this year.

I got two e-mails yesterday from people who had photos online of this. I
had received a note to a blog about another dad's photos. Now I've put those
links in one place, so if anyone wants to look at photos of a wild week-long
home educators' blowout in SE England, there they are.

AND if anyone has photos online and would be willing to send me a link,
Holly will be thrilled to have more and more photos to remember what to date has
probably been the best thing in her whole life.

Sandra


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
